PurposeOur purpose is to leverage the power of artificial intelligence (AI) to enhance the quality and precision of clinical care for neonates. As a team of experienced neonatologists, we are committed to advancing the field through the development and implementation of innovative AI-based tools and techniques that improve patient outcomes, increase efficiency, and reduce healthcare costs. Through collaboration with our peers, industry partners, and other stakeholders, we strive to create a more personalized and effective approach to neonatal care that benefits patients, families, and healthcare providers.
